name: Two Buttons in the Darkness
description:
Two Buttons in the Darkness

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=30779

Game made for LD34.

Theme : Two buttons control

The game isn't very fun but we were short on time as it was our first game jam.

You have to find two buttons which will open rooms in the level. In these rooms are placed keys, that will allow you to open the last doors to finish the game.
